content.prompt: The writer is considering deleting the phrase “which many critics consider the first science fiction novel,” in sentence 5. Which of the following factors is most important for the writer to consider when deciding whether to keep or delete the phrase?

choices.label: Which other works by Mary Shelley the audience is likely to be aware of
Why some science fiction critics choose not to write about Frankenstein
What the critics in Mary Shelley’s day thought about Frankenstein
Whether the audience is likely to regard Frankenstein as a science fiction novel

skill.text: Skill 8.B: Write sentences that clearly convey ideas and arguments.
